description: Dive into "Phan Thiet's Coastal Paradise Playlist" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Phan Thiet's Coastal Paradise Playlist

places.generalDescription: Doi Duong Beach is a popular urban strip in Phan Thiet, Binh Thuan province, offering a safe swimming environment and a vibrant atmosphere. It stretches from the Rang Dong residential area to the Bo Ke seafood area and is lined with promenades, street-food vendors, restaurants, and hotels. The beach is part of an emerging destination for beach vacationers with stunning sandy beaches in the surrounding areas.

sources.snippet: Located near Doi Duong park, right in the center of the city, Doi Duong Beach (or Fern Hill Beach) is public to everyone. The beach was given the name because there was a large area of fern trees planted in order to prevent the wind, the strong sunlight, and the rain. The government built a park that is named Doi Duong park near the beach.
sources.shortName: Top beaches in Phan Thiet, Binh Thuan

sources.snippet: Doi Duong Beach is located in the central area of Phan Thiet City, making it not only a favorite attraction for tourists but also a place locals often frequent. This beach is closely linked to the development of this central coastal city. Therefore, many tourists on a 2-day-1-night tour of Phan Thiet cannot overlook this beach.
sources.shortName: Top 6 Most Beautiful Beaches in the Coastal City of Phan Thiet

sources.snippet: As the first public beach to open to visitors in Phan Thiet, Doi Duong Beach is associated with the historical development of the coastal city here. It is called ‚ÄúDuong Hill‚Äù because positive forests surrounded the old days of this place to protect the sun from the rain. But over time, this area has been shrinking.
sources.shortName: Phan Thiet Beach: 6 most beautiful beaches in Phan Thiet that you need to visit

sources.snippet: The next beach is the first public beach opened to visitors in Phan Thiet. This is Doi Duong Beach. Doi Duong Beach is attached to the historical development of the coastal city.
sources.shortName: THE BEAUTIFUL BEACHES IN PHAN THIET | by islands vietnam

sources.snippet: Doi Duong Beach is one of the picturesque beaches in Mui Ne. Doi Duong Beach is located in the center of Phan Thiet City, about 2 km northeast from Ham Tan District.
sources.shortName: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL BEACHES IN MUI NE PHAN THIET VIETNAM

places.name: ƒê·ªìi D∆∞∆°ng Beach

reviews.text:
Loud waves crashing onto the shore and a brisk sea breeze to keep you refreshed.

What more can you ask for?

No surfing unfortunately.

The city park looks abandoned. The benches on the embankment are covered with sand, the plants are dry and some are dead. The tiles on the ground are missing or broken in places. I do not recommend wasting time visiting.

Each morning, I make it a habit to run to the beach, where the tranquil atmosphere never fails to soothe me. The ambiance is undeniably therapeutic, and the sound of the waves is something I cherish. Nevertheless, I believe the City Administration should focus more on maintaining the cleanliness of this beautiful beach.

places.address: 206 L√™ L·ª£i, H∆∞ng Long, Th√†nh ph·ªë Phan Thi·∫øt, B√¨nh Thu·∫≠n 77000, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: B√£i ƒë√° √îng ƒê·ªãa, also known as Ong Dia rock beach, is a popular coastal destination located around 10 kilometers from the center of Phan Thiet city. This picturesque spot is frequented by locals and tourists alike for its stunning views, recreational activities like kite surfing and parasailing, and opportunities for sightseeing, photography, swimming, or simply unwinding by the serene blue sea.
places.name: B√£i ƒë√° √îng ƒê·ªãa

reviews.text:
Nice Beach is a serene and clean destination that offers a fantastic escape from the hustle and bustle of city life. The beach itself is well-maintained, providing a pristine environment for visitors to enjoy. One of the standout features of Nice Beach is its pier, which is constructed with solid concrete slabs. The pier not only adds a unique aesthetic to the beach but also serves as a perfect spot for leisurely strolls and capturing beautiful photographs of the ocean.

For those looking to stay refreshed, there are several vendors along the beach where you can purchase a variety of drinks. Whether you're in the mood for a cold soda, a refreshing juice, or an ice-cold beer, you'll find plenty of options to quench your thirst. The presence of these vendors ensures that you can stay hydrated and enjoy your beach day to the fullest.

Surfing enthusiasts will be delighted to know that Nice Beach offers excellent surfing conditions. The waves are just right for both beginners and experienced surfers, providing an exciting opportunity to ride the waves and enjoy the thrill of the ocean. Even if you're not into surfing, watching the surfers in action can be an entertaining experience.

Overall, Nice Beach is a wonderful destination that offers a clean and pleasant environment for visitors of all ages. Whether you're looking to relax on the sand, take a stroll on the pier, or catch some waves, Nice Beach has something for everyone. Highly recommended for a fun and relaxing day by the sea!

Nice beach, not much garbage, the water is okay but not that clear. Lots of people here swimming and picnicking with family and friends. There are activities like zumba held at the beach. There are also people doing watersport activities like surfing. It's a very happening place and a good place for recreation especially in the evening.

Ong Dia beach is beautiful, playful and popular place. It's opposite to Sea Link hotel so many people know this beach and go to there to swim, take photos or take a rest relax with the sound of the sea. From Muine Domain it takes thirty minutes by walk to this beach. Sunbath is a healthy activity you should do on the beach.

places.address: Nguy·ªÖn ƒê√¨nh Chi·ªÉu, Ph∆∞·ªùng H√†m Ti·∫øn, Th√†nh ph·ªë Phan Thi·∫øt, B√¨nh Thu·∫≠n, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: H√≤n R∆°m is a picturesque mountain located 28 km from Phan Thiet city, in Long Son hamlet, Mui Ne ward. The area boasts stunning coastal views with clear blue waters and gentle golden sand hills lined with coconut palms. Visitors can enjoy breathtaking sunrises and sunsets, stargazing at night, or even organize a campfire.

sources.snippet: From 5:30 AM to 6:00 AM, you can have a chance to witness the hustling business scene of fishermen bringing seafood to the shore after their late beach trips. This makes Fishing Village a special beach in Mui Ne, allowing visitors to immerse themselves in the in-reality lives of local people. Don‚Äôt forget to take a deep walk inside this village to discover how to make drying fish, elaborate fish sauce, and dried squid for interesting experiences.
sources.shortName: 8 Heavenly Beaches In Mui Ne Recommended By Locals

sources.snippet: Dive into the beauty of Hon Rom Beach, a picturesque marvel that offers the perfect blend of crystal-clear waters and powdery sand. Ideal for sunbathing, swimming, or diving into adrenaline-pumping activities like kiteboarding and windsurfing. As the sun dips, the horizon lights up, offering an unforgettable sunset.
sources.shortName: Check Out The 9 Best Mui Ne Beaches: A Sun-Soaked Paradise Uncovered

sources.snippet: Hon Rom Beach is the name of a tiny mountain in Long Son hamlet, Mui Ne ward, approximately 2 kilometers from Phan Thiet city. Hon Rom Beach is correct at the foot of the mountain; the sea water is green and calm, and there are few underground rocks. This location is ideal for picnics and group activities.
sources.shortName: Phan Thiet Beach: 6 most beautiful beaches in Phan Thiet that you need to visit

sources.snippet: Ganh Beach or Hon Rom Beach stretches along Red Sand Dunes (called Suoi Hong) to Hon Rom village. The beach itself is pristine and even more spectacular than Rang Beach, but it is not a good idea to swim there. Large parts of the beach serve as a harbor for fishing boats nearly a half of year.
sources.siteName: T·ªîNG C√îNG TY DU L·ªäCH H√Ä N·ªòI
sources.shortName: MUI NE BEACHES | Hanoitourist |

sources.snippet: Upon hearing the name Hon Rom Mui Ne, many would think it's a small island far from the shore. However, Hon Rom is actually a nearshore island connected to the mainland by a narrow strip of land. On the map, Hon Rom, like Mui Ne, resembles a cape protruding into the sea.
sources.shortName: Top 6 Most Beautiful Beaches in the Coastal City of Phan Thiet

sources.snippet: Hon Rom Beach is located at the feet of Hon Rom Mountain in Long Son Commune, Mui Ne Ward, Phan Thiet City. It is about 2 km far from the city center. Blue and quiet waters, less rock, and great mountain make Hon Rom Beach one of the most favorite beaches in Phan Thiet.
sources.shortName: Top beaches in Phan Thiet, Binh Thuan

sources.snippet: Hon Rom Beach is the most famous beach of Mui Ne because of its long and wide white sand strip. The beach is located about 28 km away from Phan Thiet City. Hon Rom is the name of a small pristine mountain located in Long Son hamlet, Mui Ne.
sources.shortName: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL BEACHES IN MUI NE PHAN THIET VIETNAM

sources.snippet: If visitors want to enjoy the exciting air, travelers can visit the front beach of Hon Rom. The back beach Hon Rom with peaceful scenery, peace is the suitable destination for those who want to find a place to relax.
sources.shortName: THE BEAUTIFUL BEACHES IN PHAN THIET | by islands vietnam

sources.snippet: This stunning beach boasts crystal-clear water and powdery sand, perfect for sunbathing and swimming. Adventure seekers can explore the nearby sand dunes or try kiteboarding and windsurfing.
sources.shortName: Mui Ne's beaches: 9 mesmerizing tropical destinations

places.name: H√≤n R∆°m

reviews.text: Nice chilled beach, BYO food and beers because there ain't a lot around on the beach.
The rooms are fine enough, no ice in the fridge. The sea water was not very clear, diner menu was subpar.
As of 30.04.2024: Full of trash. Not worth visiting here.

places.address: X83P+F2W, M≈©i N√©, Th√†nh ph·ªë Phan Thi·∫øt, B√¨nh Thu·∫≠n, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Dragon Beach - Lounge Bar & Club is a renowned beachside establishment in Phan Thiet, offering a spacious and unique design with blue-hued chairs that blend into the sandy shore. Guests can unwind under the sun, read a book, or simply relax by the vast sea. The venue also features a free swimming pool area for those who prefer not to swim in the ocean and hosts lively pool parties with diverse entertainment options.

sources.snippet: Dragon Beach Bar is divided into a chilled out bar section and a spacious nightclub, both of which overlook Mui Ne Beach. Open daily, the former is fitted with shisha pipes, daybeds, and beanbags along the beach while the latter features an open-air swimming pool, dancefloor and resident DJs spinning EDM, hip-hop, and funk tunes until 03:00. Expect a heavy crowd of locals, tourists, and expats during weekends and public holidays.
sources.shortName: Trips, Holidays & Travel Packages 2025/2026

places.name: Dragon Beach - Lounge Bar & Club

reviews.text: Dragon features 2 sections, the indoor part plays top 40 hits & attracts young viets. The outdoor section plays house music where most of the tourists hang out. Throughout the night there's also pole & fire dance.

Prices are pretty high compared to other similar places in the neighbourhood, but we liked the view from beds right next to the sea. All beds had a little table and pillows. You can also choose a regular table with the same view. Personally I did not like the music (basic and ordinary techno music - no offence to the fans!) but that's of course a matter of taste.
The drinks are quite good. Love the music, DJ got good taste in mixing many genres. Daily day have fewer guests than Saturday. The price is acceptable.

places.address: 120/1 Nguy·ªÖn ƒê√¨nh Chi·ªÉu, khu ph·ªë 2, Th√†nh ph·ªë Phan Thi·∫øt, B√¨nh Thu·∫≠n, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Jibe's Beach Club - Suoi Nuoc is a popular spot that has been around since December 2000. It offers a sports bar atmosphere where you can catch your favorite international sporting events while enjoying a variety of food and drinks. The menu includes Western breakfast, burgers, pizzas, and delicious seafood with local flavors. The beach club also provides romantic views and cozy seating areas for guests to relax. Additionally, it hosts rooftop parties and buffets attracting many visitors.

sources.snippet: Also, both Source Kiteboarding and Jibe‚Äôs Beach Club have a super friendly, knowledgeable, and patient team of instructors. Plus, they take your safety seriously!. No matter what your experience level, both will make sure you have a great time.
sources.shortName: 11 Awesome Things to do in Mui Ne, Vietnam

sources.snippet: This is Suoi Noc beach and it's a beautiful and desolate stretch of sand that's over 10km long, perhaps even longer than Rang beach. The loneliness is usually only disturbed by shepherd boys herding their goats and cows along the beach.
sources.shortName: The Ultimate Guide To Mui Ne Beach Resort: Awe-Inspiring Sand Dunes In Vietnam

places.name: Jibe's Beach Club - Suoi Nuoc

reviews.text: It's beach front bar restaurant. We stay at Full Moon Villlage Resort and the Clubs is belong to the Resort. We ate all meals in here. We really like Seafood BBQ Set (clams, shrimps,squid, fish, beef, chicken and side dishes) and price is just nearly 45$ for 2, but its enough for our family of 4 (2 adults and 2 kids), the photo you saw is just side dishes of the Set.

We are staying in Ham Tien and decided to make the journey to jibes today in search of a chilled beach to relax on. We were not disappointed. The beach here is gorgeously rustic and clean. Food at jibes was delicious and reasonable. We really enjoyed our day here and can highly recommend it if you want a nice chilled day.

Nice and chill restaurant. Had 2 tables outside facing the beach. It was empty when we went for dinner on a Monday night. The banana lassi (requested for no sugar) was easily the best lassi I've ever had. They use edible straws made from flour.

We also had Saigon beer, passionfruit/dragonfruit juice, claypot fried rice (shrimps and fish - barracuda) and homemade spinach ricotta ravioli in pesto sauce (a little bland). Fried rice was not bad. About 10 to 20 usd for main courses.

There's also western food and appetizers on the menu. We were able to get the staff to drop us off at our resort (1km away) on his motorbike for approximately 1 usd.

places.address: X8RV+7V6, H√†m Thu·∫≠n B·∫Øc, B√¨nh Thu·∫≠n, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Mui Ne Beach is a popular destination for travelers looking to relax in hotels or resorts with private beaches and swimming pools. Visitors can explore the natural beauty of the area, including the red and white dunes, tranquil fishing villages, and local markets. The Bay Mui Ne offers beachfront accommodations with easy access to attractions like Long Beach Pearl Museum and Tropical Minigolf. Guests can enjoy amenities such as complimentary Wi-Fi, tour assistance, and on-site dining options.

sources.snippet: From 5:30 AM to 6:00 AM, you can have a chance to witness the hustling business scene of fishermen bringing seafood to the shore after their late beach trips. This makes Fishing Village a special beach in Mui Ne, allowing visitors to immerse themselves in the in-reality lives of local people. Don‚Äôt forget to take a deep walk inside this village to discover how to make drying fish, elaborate fish sauce, and dried squid for interesting experiences.
sources.shortName: 8 Heavenly Beaches In Mui Ne Recommended By Locals

sources.snippet: Mui Ne Beach features 15km of sandy beaches, gentle waves and luxurious beachfront resorts. The northern end of Mui Ne Beach is home to a traditional fishing village while the southern caters to recreational activities, including swimming, kitesurfing, kayaking, and surfing. The period between November and March is ideal to enjoy these activities since the weather is sunny with strong winds.
sources.shortName: Phan Thiet Travel Guide - All Things You Need to Know

sources.snippet: Mui Ne Beach runs along the coast of this popular coastal town in the capital of Binh Thuan province. It features 15 kilometers of sandy beaches, gentle waves, and luxurious beachfront resorts. The northern end of Mui Ne Beach is home to a traditional fishing village while the southern caters to recreational activities such as swimming and water sports.
sources.shortName: Trips, Holidays & Travel Packages 2025/2026

sources.snippet: Mui Ne Beach is a coastal fishing town in the south central B√¨nh Thuan Province of Vietnam. The distance is about 200km from Ho Chi Minh City and it takes 4.5 hours of driving. Mui Ne has beautiful beaches and steady wind conditions that make it a good destination for windsurfing, kitesurfing, sailing and other water sports.
sources.shortName: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL BEACHES IN MUI NE PHAN THIET VIETNAM

sources.snippet: It is a 16-kilomettre stretch of soft-white sand, turquoise water and endless sunshine. Gracefully shaded with coconut palms, Rang Beach describes the ideal beach in imagination of many people. It offers the very best conditions for swimming as well as some world-class surfing, kite boarding and windsurfing.
sources.siteName: T·ªîNG C√îNG TY DU L·ªäCH H√Ä N·ªòI
sources.shortName: MUI NE BEACHES | Hanoitourist |

sources.snippet: Back in the early 90's, Mui Ne was a relatively underdeveloped bolt-hole for expats and savvy tourists; a peaceful coastal getaway from the more manic tourist hotspots in Vietnam. The road lining the main stretch of beach was relatively empty, save for a few low-profile resorts, guesthouses and restaurants.
sources.shortName: The Ultimate Guide To Mui Ne Beach Resort: Awe-Inspiring Sand Dunes In Vietnam

sources.snippet: Disappointing beach that proves that Vietnam isn‚Äôt the right place for beach holidays. If that‚Äôs what you are looking for, just do yourself a favor and go to Thailand üôÇ The beach is full of garbage and some shady guys ask 50.000 VND to access it. Save your time and money and skip it.
sources.shortName: Coastal Vietnam: Phan Thiet and Mui Ne - Pin Your Footsteps

sources.snippet: With a warm and sunny climate all year round, (drizzle and daily temperatures around 27‚ÑÉ), Binh Thuan is home to such standout destinations as Mui Ne Beach, Co Thach Beach a.k.a Seven-Color Stone Beach, Ta Cu Mountain, Bau Trang Sand Dune and many more must-see destinations.
sources.shortName: Binh Thuan: Much more than White Sand, Golden Sunshine, and Blue Sea

sources.snippet: A coastal haven, Mui Ne unfolds with a series of beaches that define beauty, serenity, and adventure. Each beach has its own tale and unique charm to show off. Here‚Äôs our handpicked list of the 9 best beaches you can‚Äôt miss when in Mui Ne.
sources.shortName: Check Out The 9 Best Mui Ne Beaches: A Sun-Soaked Paradise Uncovered

sources.snippet: Mui Ne Beach, also known as Fishing Village Beach, is one of Mui Ne's best beaches. The golden sand, crystal-clear water, and gentle breeze make it a perfect spot for sunbathing and relaxation.
sources.shortName: Mui Ne's beaches: 9 mesmerizing tropical destinations

places.name: Mui Ne Beach

reviews.text: Warm sunlight glistens, brushing against each azure waves coarsing the coast.

We are there to celebrate my birthday last nov. 28  we stay at Meraki Oasis Hotel who has this very beautiful infinity pool. The wave is very high and strong during that time so I dont recommend swimming on the beach. So many local seafood restaurant. This place is very accessible from HCMC so if you want to escape the bustle of the city come in this tranquil beach place.

Beach is more or less gone - there are some parts of sand at some resorts and at the western end (Kite surfing school) and at Papa Kite school, where I got my birthday Kite day! (great)
The water is green brownish (5.Dec)
the clouds are grey...

places.address: ƒê. Xu√¢n Th·ªßy, H√†m Thu·∫≠n B·∫Øc, B√¨nh Thu·∫≠n 77157, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Pogo Beach Bar & Grill is a laid-back beachfront venue located on Nguyen Dinh Chieu. During the day, guests can enjoy amenities like live music, free Wi-Fi, pool tables, and daybeds while browsing through books and board games. In the evening, movie nights and DJ sets are offered. The bar also features an elevated wooden deck with beanbags for watching the sunset.

sources.snippet: Pogo Beach Bar & Restaurant is an open-air nightlife venue set along Nguyen Dinh Chieu, featuring live music, free Wi-Fi, pool tables, and daybeds, as well as extensive food and alcohol menus. Open all day, guests can browse through its collection of books and board games while night-time is reserved for movie nights and DJ sets. There‚Äôs also an elevated beachfront wooden deck with beanbags and pillows ‚Äì perfect for watching the sun set into the horizon.
sources.shortName: Trips, Holidays & Travel Packages 2025/2026

places.name: Pogo Beach Bar & Grill

reviews.text: The best beach bar.Super relaxing and great Friendly staff.

The only downfall to this beautiful bar on the beach is that they don't have everything they claim to have on the menu. Like we were told nachos take too long so they don't do those any more... nachos are so easy to make! But if you're looking for a place to relax on a bed on the beach sipping some beer. This is the place to go
Super chill vibe.

Found this restaurant as we were passing by on bikes. Been travelling for weeks in SE asia and is easily one of the best meals we have had. The Viet Curry and pancakes were a standout. Great atmosphere, decor and staff! Would recommend to all!

places.address: 138 Nguy·ªÖn ƒê√¨nh Chi·ªÉu, Ph∆∞·ªùng H√†m Ti·∫øn, H√†m Thu·∫≠n B·∫Øc, B√¨nh Thu·∫≠n, Vietnam

places.generalDescription: Thuan Quy Beach is a hidden gem that showcases the untouched beauty of nature, standing in stark contrast to the urbanized resort scene of Mui Ne. Nestled in Ham Thuan Nam district, just 30 km from Phan Thiet City, this beach boasts a serene 7 km stretch of soft sand and gentle waves that create a tranquil atmosphere at both sunrise and sunset. Visitors are captivated by its rustic charm, where lush orchards and vibrant green ferns enhance the picturesque landscape.

sources.snippet: Thuan Quy Beach is truly a precious gift of nature in the era where the smokeless industry has intervened too much in nature. If Mui Ne is considered the 'urbanization' of the resort service development process, then Thuan Quy Beach remains the 'rustic' and genuine village that many people hope will be preserved forever. The long sandy beach embraces the sea, keeping every sound of the waves gentle at sunrise or when the sunset.
sources.shortName: Top 6 Most Beautiful Beaches in the Coastal City of Phan Thiet

sources.snippet: The beach surprises visitor with the wild but lovely nature. It has been said that the wave, white bubbles, green fern trees, and lush orchards make the beach dreamlike and lyrical. The highlights of this beach include groups of rocks in many shapes, especially the masterpiece called ‚ÄúThe hand of Buddhist‚Äù.
sources.shortName: Top beaches in Phan Thiet, Binh Thuan

sources.snippet: Thuan Quy Beach is located in Ham Thuan Nam district, about 30 km from the center of Phan Thiet City. Thuan Quy Beach is one of Mui Ne beaches that still retain the most pristine natural beauty and peace. The beach has a long coastline, stretching for 7 km.
sources.shortName: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL BEACHES IN MUI NE PHAN THIET VIETNAM

sources.snippet: Thuan Quy is one of the most pristine beaches in the coastal city of Phan Thiet. The beach is around 30 kilometers from the city center. The pristine but lovely scenery takes visitors by surprise.
sources.shortName: Phan Thiet Beach: 6 most beautiful beaches in Phan Thiet that you need to visit

sources.snippet: This beach is one of the most pristine beaches in Phan Thiet City. The beach is about 30km from the city center. When coming here, visitors are not surprised by the wild scene.
sources.shortName: THE BEAUTIFUL BEACHES IN PHAN THIET | by islands vietnam

sources.snippet: The most interesting thing in Tien Thanh beach is the area of beautiful rocks called Jumping Rock Bay or Rock garden due to its numerous stones and cliffs in different shapes and sizes such as long, short, square, round, etc. They are stacked with each other to create a spectacular picture for every tourist to contemplate.
sources.shortName: THE MOST BEAUTIFUL BEACHES IN MUI NE PHAN THIET VIETNAM

sources.snippet: Located in the south of Phan Thiet city, Tien Thanh Beach is quite secluded and less crowded, making it perfect for those seeking tranquility by the sea. At Tien Thanh Beach, you can spend the whole day relaxing with gentle sea activities or savoring delicious dishes at nearby resorts' restaurants.
sources.shortName: Explore the Stunning Beaches of Phan Thiet

reviews.text: OK
Could be a real nice beach. Nice beach and scenery. Cleanliness is a big problem. Trash everywhere, especially close to the road.
Quiet and nice place for family beach days. I went on weekend but still not crowded. Would recommend.

places.generalDescription: The charming Champa Restaurant offers exquisite French cuisine in a lovely garden setting overlooking the circular pool of the Coco Beach Resort. Chef Thierry Guinea and his team prepare dishes using only fresh, quality ingredients, complementing an excellent wine list. Ethnic decor reflects the region's culture with brick arches and polished floorboards. The menu features pizza, hamburgers, beefsteak, pasta, chicken Kiev, catfish skewers and more.

sources.snippet: The Champa restaurant oÔ¨Äers genuine French dining in a lovely garden setting and overlooks the circular pool of the Coco Beach Resort. Chef Thierry Guinea and his team prepare exquisite French dishes, using only fresh ingredients, paired with a good selection from the excellent wine list. The delightful ethnic d√©cor reÔ¨Çects the regional culture with archways of brick and polished Ô¨Çoorboards.
sources.shortName: Trips, Holidays & Travel Packages 2025/2026

places.generalDescription: Long Beach Pearl is a well-known pearl jewelry brand in Vietnam, with showrooms located at popular resorts like Nha Trang and Mui Ne Phan Thiet. The showrooms are world-class jewelry centers, spanning from 1000 to 2000 square meters. While the prices may be higher than other places, the brand is renowned for its high-quality products. Visitors appreciate the non-pushy sales approach and the understanding staff who help them find the perfect pearls within their budget.

sources.snippet: Long Beach Pearl, a renowned pearl jewelry brand in Vietnam, has showrooms located at well-known paradise resorts of Vietnam, such as Nha Trang, Mui Ne ‚Äì Phan Thiet,... Long Beach Pearl showrooms are really world-class jewelry centers of Vietnam. Most showrooms of this brand are 1000 to 2000 square meters.
sources.shortName: Trips, Holidays & Travel Packages 2025/2026

places.name: Long Beach Pearl

reviews.text:
A friend recommended this place. I went to have a nice time looking at the pearls as most of the other shops I find have tacky or heaving designs.
The Vietnamese sales people were understanding and not pushing. When they figured out what I liked and the type of budget I could put, they showed very nice earrings. I chose non perfect Vietnamese pearls (which I prefer) at a good price for me and feel I have a special souvenir from Vietnam.
The showroom have variety of jewelry. They're nice and fashioned... By the way, you can exchange money w good cost
100 USD is 2.3M VND here at the moment that is a bit more expensive than in Ho Chi Minh City.

places.generalDescription: Red Sand Dunes Beach, also known as White Sand Dunes, is a must-see attraction in Mui Ne. The area earned its desert moniker due to the stunning landscape of white sand dunes. Visitors can partake in various activities such as surfing, quad biking, and sliding down the dunes. However, simply taking in the breathtaking scenery is an experience in itself.

sources.snippet: The very famous Red and White Sand Dunes in Mui Ne ‚Äì Phan Thiet. No trip to Phan Thiet would be complete without an adventure to the sand dunes. The Red Sand Dunes are around 11km out of Mui Ne and are best seen at sunset when the orange sand burns a fiery red.
sources.shortName: Phan Thiet Travel Guide - All Things You Need to Know

sources.snippet: The Fairy Stream, Fishing Village, White Sand Dunes and Red Sand Dunes are a few the famous popular places to visit that you can be toured in 4,5 hours. This is one of those great travel packages that you can enjoy during sunrise or sunset.
sources.shortName: Experiences in Mui Ne, Phan Thiet, Viet Nam

places.name: Red Sand Dunes Beach

reviews.text:
I'd recommend hitting the Red Sand Dunes before heading up to the famous White Sand Dunes. You will see why from the name, the sand here is a deep, rusty red compared to the bright white up north. It's the closest dune spot to Mui Ne, so try to visit first thing in the morning when the light is at its best.

I swung by one afternoon in June, but it was so cloudy we couldn't even get in. So, definitely check the weather and aim for clear skies!
If it's included in the tour or nearby, it's worth a visit. I had already had a blast at White Sand dune before coming here, so maybe I wasn't as impressed. The sand isn't as red as I expected!?

The dunes are small, reddish and look like a piece of Mars landscape.

Such a shame that this site is full of garbage.

A woman stopped our scooter and tried to push us very hard to pay for sliding off the dunes. We didn't agree. Then she aggressively forced us to pay for parking. I'm sure it was a scam.
